Colonization of The New World Deluxue
How will you settle The New World, through conquest or diplomacy? Will you plunder or protect? A 165 turn 6-player scenario.

In this 175 turn scenario, you race to colonise The New World. Will you pluder its vast natural resources or protect its cultural heritage and pristine beauty from the unrelentling advance of exploitation? The choice is yours. But there is no Domination, Religious or Science victory. In THE NEW WORLD you earn special points towards victory. (See below).[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Single-player: Each difficulty has a total score threshold.
